MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML12 postcode area of Biggar. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a complex repair to a faulty transformer at Ten Langholm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.30pm on the 8th of December 2020.
